title: FS: N172 Bobby Gilks & N284 Jim Manning overprint

posts.post_title: FS: N172 Bobby Gilks & N284 Jim Manning overprint
posts.post_content:
2 N cards for sale:

N172 Bobby Gilks, Cleveland batting. Shoeless Joes manager at Savannah.  Poor. $65

N284 Buchners Gold Coin Jim Manning with the partial advertisement overprint. No creasing. $old

Feel free to make an offer!
Thanks!!
